item.title: Data Structures and Algorithms Introduction
item.description: Finally got some time to do this. This is the first post of me learning data structures and algorithms online courses. I’ll take down my notes and put it here to share with you guys. Let’s begin! Introduction Why is data structures and algorithms so important? Why does every student major in computer science related fields needs to take this course? The answer is because we need to practice Leetcode questions and pass interviews to get a job.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Lee is an outgoing, meticulous, curious person and a team player. After graduating from NTUST, department of Electrical Engineering, he founds himself a spot in the industry of Cloud Services. He is currently a Technical Support Engineer at iKala Interactive Media Inc., with experience of handling customer’s daily questions in Google Cloud Platform(GCP). He works on GCP, Kuberneters, Docker, Linux and Golang in his daily job. Lee is also passion in software developing.
